entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: In a recent communication, a recommendation was put forward to explore a particular idea with the involvement of an individual named Seccour. This person comes highly recommended and has already been vetted through in-person interactions. Seccour is noted for organizing Bitcoin meetups at various locations around the globe, demonstrating a level of engagement and expertise within the cryptocurrency community. The endorsement highlights Seccour's credibility and the potential value they could bring to the project under consideration.
